#summary reload()
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Reloads the property values of this object from the database.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset anEmployee = model("employee").findByKey(params.key)>
<cfset someStupidCallThatChangesValuesInTheDatabase()>
<!--- better reload... --->
<cfset anEmployee.reload()>
}}}
